{"model":"gpt-4o-2024-08-06","input":[{"role":"system","content":"You are manipulating a text document using TSX components.
Each block is represented as a TSX component with props.
"},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"output_text","text":"There is no active selection. This is the latest state of the document (ignore previous documents, you MUST issue operations against this latest version of the document). 
The cursor is BETWEEN two blocks as indicated by cursor: true.
Because the document is empty, YOU MUST first update the empty block before adding new blocks."}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"output_text","text":"[{"id":"ref1$","block":"<Paragraph textAlignment=\"left\" id=\"ref1\" />"},{"cursor":true}]"}]},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"input_text","text":"write a new paragraph with the text 'You look great today!'"}]}],"tools":[{"type":"function","name":"file_replace","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"target":{"type":"string","description":"The string to replace"},"replacement":{"type":"string","description":"The replacement string"}},"required":["target","replacement"]}}],"tool_choice":"required","stream":true}
